languages.text: Один из металлических черепов украшает подпись создателя, и его тщеславие объяснимо: этот ремень — вершина кожевенного мастерства.
One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.
languages.original_text: Один из металлических черепов украшает подпись создателя, и его тщеславие объяснимо: этот ремень — вершина кожевенного мастерства.

traits.locale_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

languages.text: L'un des crânes métalliques qui ornent la ceinture est gravé du nom de son artisan, qui aurait eu tort de ne pas signer son ouvrage : il s'agit d'un véritable chef-d'œuvre de maroquinerie.
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: L'un des crânes métalliques qui ornent la ceinture est gravé du nom de son artisan, qui aurait eu tort de ne pas signer son ouvrage : il s'agit d'un véritable chef-d'œuvre de maroquinerie.

languages.text: このベルトを飾る金属製のスカルの一つには制作者の署名が刻まれているが、そのプライドも頷ける。これはまさに革細工の極致だ。
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: このベルトを飾る金属製のスカルの一つには制作者の署名が刻まれているが、そのプライドも頷ける。これはまさに革細工の極致だ。

languages.text: Bu kemeri süsleyen kafataslarından biri, yapımcısının imzasını taşıyor. Kendisi ne kadar övünse az, bu gerçekten de dericiliğin zirvesini simgeleyen bir eser.
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: Bu kemeri süsleyen kafataslarından biri, yapımcısının imzasını taşıyor. Kendisi ne kadar övünse az, bu gerçekten de dericiliğin zirvesini simgeleyen bir eser.

languages.text: Uno de los cráneos de metal que adorna el cinturón lleva la firma del creador, cuya vanidad está justificada. Es una obra maestra del trabajo en cuero.
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: Uno de los cráneos de metal que adorna el cinturón lleva la firma del creador, cuya vanidad está justificada. Es una obra maestra del trabajo en cuero.

languages.text: 这条腰带上装饰着几颗金属头骨，其中一颗上面刻着工匠的名字。这样的炫耀行为可以理解，毕竟这条腰带确实是皮革工艺的巅峰之作。
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: 这条腰带上装饰着几颗金属头骨，其中一颗上面刻着工匠的名字。这样的炫耀行为可以理解，毕竟这条腰带确实是皮革工艺的巅峰之作。

languages.text: Einer der metallenen Schädel an diesem Gürtel ist völlig zurecht mit der Signatur seines Schöpfers versehen ... dieser Gürtel ist ein wahres Meisterstück der Lederbearbeitung.
languages.original_text: One of the metal skulls adorning this belt bears its maker's signature, and their vanity is justified — this truly is the pinnacle of leathercraft.

traits.locale_text: Einer der metallenen Schädel an diesem Gürtel ist völlig zurecht mit der Signatur seines Schöpfers versehen ... dieser Gürtel ist ein wahres Meisterstück der Lederbearbeitung.
